message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. Let's aim for a compromise at $100. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $100. Would you be willing to meet me at $92? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
